Package edu.wit.scds.comp2000.queue.app.utilities

Class Configuration

java.lang.Object
edu.wit.scds.comp2000.queue.app.utilities.Configuration
public final class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object
Configuration file parser.

NOTE: This parser assumes that all specifications in the configuration file are valid (e.g. positive, non-zero whole numbers are greater than 0). Future enhancements to this class could enforce the documented constraints and/or provide reasonable defaults to override invalid specifications. As an alternative, it can throw an exception tbd.

NOTE: You may use this class, with or without modification, in your Comp 2000, Queue application/Train Simulation solution. You must retain all authorship comments. If you modify this, add your authorship and modification history tags after the existing tags.

Version:
1.0.0 initial version, 1.1.0 track changes to the configuration file layout, 1.2.0 add toString(), 2.0.0 2021-10-30 move PairedLimit, RouteSpec, and TrainSpec to separate classes
Author:
Dave Rosenberg

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> parameters  
    static int PASSENGERS_INITIAL
    Index into the array of PairedLimits returned by getPassengers() for the number of Passengers to create during the creation/initial population phase of the TrainSimulation.
    static int PASSENGERS_PER_TICK
    Index into the array of PairedLimits returned by getPassengers() for the number of Passengers to create during each clock tick/iteration of the run phase of the TrainSimulation.

  • Constructor Details

    • Configuration

      public Configuration() throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Sets up the instance with the default configuration filename (./data/TrainSimulation.config) in the data folder. The configuration file is opened, read, then closed. Parsing of the individual specifications is delayed until the corresponding getXxx() method is invoked.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the default configuration file (TrainSimulation.config) is missing or can't be opened for reading

    • Configuration

      public Configuration​(java.lang.String configurationFilename) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Sets up the instance with the contents of the specified configuration filename. The configuration file is opened, read, then closed. Parsing of the individual specifications is delayed until the corresponding getXxx() method is invoked.
      Parameters:
      configurationFilename - including a path specification, typically the data folder; if a path is specified, it must be relative to the default location (e.g. "./data/TrainSimulation.config")

      Note: Absolute paths will work but are not acceptable for this lab.

      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the configuration file is missing or can't be opened for reading

  • Method Details

    • getPassengers

      public PairedLimit[] getPassengers()
      Parses the initial and per-tick limits (min, max) for the number of Passengers to instantiate
      Returns:
      an array containing the initial and per-tick limits

    • getRoute

      public RouteSpecification getRoute()
      Parses the style and length of the Route
      Returns:
      the style and length of the Route

    • getSeed

      public int getSeed()
      Parses the value to use to seed the random number generator. The default is 0, which should be treated as a sentinel value to either (1) not seed the random number generator or (2) seed it with the current time.
      Returns:
      the specified seed value for the random number generator or 0 if none specified

    • getStations

      public int[] getStations()
      Parses the comma-separated list of Station positions along the route
      Returns:
      the positions of the Stations along the route, where each position is in 1..RouteSpec.length, inclusive

    • getTicks

      public int getTicks()
      Parses the number of clock ticks for the TrainSimulation loop
      Returns:
      the number of clock ticks

    • getTrains

      public TrainSpecification[] getTrains()
      Parses the comma-separate list of Train specifications
      Returns:
      the locations, directions, and capacities of the Trains, where each location is in 1..RouteSpec.length, inclusive, and the capacity is a positive, non-zero whole number

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Test driver
      Parameters:
      args - -unused-
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - if TrainSimulation.config is missing or can't be opened for reading
